phrase: Is this place open to visitors?

translation.translation: この場所は観光客に開放されていますか？
translation.transliteration: Kono basho wa kankoukyaku ni kaihou sarete imasu ka?

translation.translation: 这个地方对游客开放吗？
translation.transliteration: Zhège dìfāng duì yóukè kāifàng ma?

translation.translation: Is this place open to visitors?
translation.transliteration: Is this place open to visitors?

translation.translation: 이곳은 관광객에게 개방되어 있나요?
Nơi này có mở cửa cho du khách không?
translation.transliteration: Noi nay co mo cua cho du khach khong?

translation.translation: Apakah tempat ini terbuka untuk pengunjung?
translation.transliteration: Apakah tempat ini terbuka untuk pengunjung?

translation.translation: สถานที่นี้เปิดให้เข้าชมหรือไม่?
translation.transliteration: Sathan thi ni poed hai khao chom rue mai?

translation.translation: ここで写真を撮ってもいいですか？
translation.transliteration: Koko de shashin o totte mo ii desu ka?

translation.translation: 我可以在这里拍照吗？
translation.transliteration: Wǒ kěyǐ zài zhèlǐ pāizhào ma?

translation.translation: Can I take pictures here?
여기서 사진 찍어도 될까요?
Tôi có thể chụp ảnh ở đây không?
translation.transliteration: Toi co the chup anh o day khong?

translation.translation: Bolehkah saya mengambil foto di sini?
translation.transliteration: Bolehkah saya mengambil foto di sini?

translation.translation: ถ่ายรูปที่นี่ได้ไหมครับ/คะ?
translation.transliteration: Thai rup thi ni dai mai khrap/kha?

phrase: Excuse me, could you help me?

translation.translation: すみません、手伝っていただけますか？
打扰一下，你能帮我吗？
translation.transliteration: Dǎrǎo yīxià, nǐ néng bāng wǒ ma?

translation.translation: Excuse me, could you help me?
translation.transliteration: Excuse me, could you help me?

translation.translation: 실례합니다, 도와주실 수 있나요?
Xin lỗi, bạn có thể giúp tôi được không?
translation.transliteration: Xin loi, ban co the giup toi duoc khong?

translation.translation: Permisi, bisakah Anda membantu saya?
ขอโทษครับ/คะ ช่วยฉันหน่อยได้ไหมครับ/คะ?
translation.transliteration: Kho thot khrap/kha, chuay chan noi dai mai khrap/kha?

translation.translation: こんにちは、お元気ですか？
你好，你怎么样？
Hello, how are you?
안녕하세요, 어떻게 지내세요?
Xin chào, bạn có khỏe không?
translation.transliteration: Xin chao, ban co khoe khong?

translation.translation: Halo, apa kabar?
สวัสดีครับ/ค่ะ สบายดีไหมครับ/คะ?
translation.transliteration: Sawatdi khrap/kha, sabai di mai khrap/kha?

translation.translation: どうもありがとうございます！
非常感谢！
Thank you very much!
정말 감사합니다!
Cảm ơn rất nhiều!
Terima kasih banyak!
ขอบคุณมากครับ/ค่ะ!
